name: Crazy Couple Ride
description:
Take a thrilling ride through the city that never sleeps with 3D Crazy Couple Ride.

Challenge and overcome loop-the-loops, big jumps, tunnels and more to upgrade your amount of carts from 2 to 4!

Features:
- Amazing 3D Graphics
- Simple controls
- Touch to accelerate
- Customize your vehicles
- Touch to change gears
